title: Pivot Facet Problem with solr.PathHierarchyTokenizerFactory
description: Pivot facet is showing the same count for all children of a parent in a hierarchy. I tested the Solr 4.1 and there's no problem. In solr 4.10.1 all entities are repeating for all children of a parent.

comments.author: Hoss Man
comments.content:
Mehmet: 

you haven't provided enough details to understand how to reproduce the problem you are facing.

the files you attached appera to be the outputs of a facet query, but (besides the fact that they aren't valid XML) you haven't told us what type of configuration or starting data you used when you ran these queries.

can you please provide:

	your schema.xml
	your solrconfig.xml
	some sample data that can be indexed using those configs
	specific query examples showing the problem?
